briefTitle: Impact of Pre-Operative Web-based Breast Cancer Information on the Quality of Patient Decision-Making
officialTitle: A Randomized Controlled Trial Evaluating the Impact of Pre-Operative Web-based Breast Cancer Information on the Quality of Patient Decision-Making
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Knowledge using the Breast Cancer Decision Quality Instrument
eligibilityCriteria:
1. \>18 years of age
2. Newly diagnosed stage 0-3 breast cancer
3. English speaking
4. Has an email address
5. No prior recent contact with the breast surgeon
